Html:
hi, didn't found a clue to my issue.

i just figured out that getcalculatedValue is for VLOOKUP,

but it takes hell of time to do the calculation. for 600 lines it takes about 1 min. 20 sec.
But i have to run a cronjob wich needs to process > 200 Files at an run, wich will be about 6 hours.

Is there any solution to speed that up?

Version is 1.7.6

Thx for any adivce.
